title: Dozens more civilians rescued from Ukrainian steel plant - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. Dozens more civilians rescued from Ukrainian steel plant  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Ukrainian 'Complex Operation' Underway To Evacuate Civilians From Mariupol  NBC News
  3. U.S. intel helped Ukraine sink Russian flagship Moskva, officials say; U.S. announces more humanitarian aid  CNBC
  4. Families of Mariupol's last defending troops plead for their lives - BBC News  BBC News
  5. 'We're so sorry': Mariupol plant evacuees feel relief, grief  The Associated Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ZAPORIZHZHIA, Ukraine (AP) — Dozens more civilians were rescued Friday from the tunnels under the besieged steel mill where Ukrainian fighters in Mariupol have been making their last stand to prevent Moscow's complete takeover of the strategically important port city.
